issue.title: sdformat.com doesn't have documentation of sdf elements and versions

content.raw:
I started adding [some wiki stuff on gazebosim.org for now](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/SDFormat), should move them to [sdformat.com wiki](http://sdformat.com/wiki) when ready.

A picture like this: ![urdf model diagram](http://wiki.ros.org/urdf/XML/model?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=link.png) could be very helpful to understanding how frames are laid out for people trying to use sdf.
content.html:
